sentences.sentence: She plays the mandolin superlatively well.
sentences.translation: 她演奏曼陀林非常出色。

sentences.sentence: The results is that a "reason" has been found for turning out zillions of packages of something that will "do" for nearly all and isn't even imagined to be superlatively good by a single soul.
sentences.translation: 其结果是得出一个“理由”，去生产出大量的包装食品。这些食品几乎所有的人都能“凑合着用”，但是不会有人认为它们是特别好的东西。
